title: The happinesse of practice. By Samuel VVard, Bachelour in Diuinity, and preacher of Ipswich
author: Ward, Samuel, 1577-1640.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by George Purslowe] for Iohn Marriot, and Iohn Grismond, and are to be sold at their shops in Saint Dunstans Church-yard in Fleetstreet, and in Pauls Ally, at the signe of the Gunne,
